name: Safety Team
description: Uses conflict resolution and de-escalation rather than strict policing to keep the community safe.

name: Community Management
description: Manages and hosts events to help foster a positive community base.

name: World Development
description: Develops and maintains the current Skits'N'Bits Theatre world and any other worlds required for special events.

name: Video Production
description: Plans and produces various skits, sketches, and short films  and handles streaming certain events.

name: Show Department
description: Gathers performers and hosts our monthly show.

name: Workshop Department
description: Hosts and teaches our weekly improv workshop.

name: Usher
description: Greets late joiners of our events, informs them of what is happening, and guiding them to where they need to be.
